4309150.name: Memories Loaming
4309150.description:
"I'm not supposed to be here. I swore - to Susan's memory, to myself - that I'd never come back to Yetman's Basin. I could scatter these ashes anywhere and nobody would ever know, so why am I still driving?"

YETMAN'S BASIN, LABRADOR

You're working Ranger Station 8 on Route 530. Your directive: keep people away from the Basin. Investigate the wilderness. Survive until morning.

But if you do survive, you might find yourself pulled back. Again. And again. You'll uncover the Basin's secrets piece by piece.

WHAT TO EXPECT

Memories Loaming takes place over a single night in a remote stretch of Labrador wilderness. You'll explore an open world forest with many threats and limited means to fight back - survival means avoidance, preparation, and knowledge.

If you play once: Expect a one-hour survival experience. Your goal is simple: make it to morning.

If you return: Expect a deeper mystery. The puzzles are designed for actual note-taking (pen and paper recommended). A meta-progression system tracks your discoveries across playthroughs, populating a museum of everything you've learned. Multiple endings unlock as your understanding grows.

FEATURES

  • Performance evaluations

  • Light hydration mechanics

  • Opportunities to get lost in the woods

  • Psychological deterioration

  • Functional navigation equipment

  • Bear horror
4309150.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言

categories.description: 无需应对快速反应事件
